titles.title: To establish a payroll loan facility for small financial institutions affected by COVID-19, and for other purposes.
To establish a payroll loan facility for small financial institutions affected by COVID-19, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill provides specified funds to the Department of the Treasury to establish a payroll loan facility that provides loans to small financial institutions. These loans must offer, to the maximum extent practicable, benefits and assistance similar to the Paycheck Protection Program created in response to the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) pandemic. Treasury must also establish a loan forgiveness program for these loans.
